name: Space Alien Warrior
description:
On Google play available to buy "turn ads off", 1000 & 10 000 gold.

Scrolling space shooter.

- time to time increasing number of alien enemies.

- two tipes of weapons(blaster & rockets).

- droped powerups from enemies & asteroids( life, hp, rockets)

- avoid asteroids or shoot em!

- avoid enemy homing missles!

- stay alive as long as you can!

-earn gold & buy upgrades & new ships!
